entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 5:20AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...ENHANCED RISK OF WILDFIRE SPREAD TODAY... The combination of low humidity values, breezy conditions, and dry fine fuels will lead to an enhanced threat for fire spread through early this evening. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 5:20AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...ENHANCED RISK OF WILDFIRE SPREAD TODAY... The combination of low humidity values, breezy conditions, and dry fine fuels will lead to an enhanced threat for fire spread through early this evening. Relative humidity values are forecast to drop to around 25-30% this afternoon with northwesterly winds increasing to around 10-15 mph and gusts of 20-25 mph expected.
